events.name: Explosions in Kyiv following Sievierodonetsk counter-offensive
events.wd_label: Explosions in Kyiv following Sievierodonetsk counter-offensive
events.wd_description: Several explosions rocked Kyiv early Sunday after Ukrainian troops recaptured the eastern battlefield city of Sievierodonetsk in a counter-offensive against Russia.
events.description: Several explosions rocked Kyiv early Sunday after Ukrainian troops recaptured the eastern battlefield city of Sievierodonetsk in a counter-offensive against Russia.

events.name: Kyiv explosions
events.wd_description: Explosions in Kyiv resulted in at least one hospitalization with no reported deaths, with the railway network appearing to be the target.
events.description: Explosions in Kyiv resulted in at least one hospitalization with no reported deaths, with the railway network appearing to be the target.

events.name: Sievierodonetsk counter-offensive
events.wd_description: Ukrainian forces recaptured about half of Sievierodonetsk from Russian troops, according to the governor of the Luhansk region.
events.description: Ukrainian forces recaptured about half of Sievierodonetsk from Russian troops, according to the governor of the Luhansk region.

events.name: Situation in Sievierodonetsk
events.wd_description: Mayor Oleksandr Stryuk described the situation as tense and complicated, with Ukrainian military efforts focused on driving the enemy out of the city.
events.description: Mayor Oleksandr Stryuk described the situation as tense and complicated, with Ukrainian military efforts focused on driving the enemy out of the city.

events.name: Suspension of BJP spokespersons
events.wd_description: Nupur Sharma and Naveen Kumar Jindal, spokespeople of India's ruling Party, have been suspended following their comments against the Islamic Prophet Muhammed, which led to protests in the Middle East.
events.description: Nupur Sharma and Naveen Kumar Jindal, spokespeople of India's ruling Party, have been suspended following their comments against the Islamic Prophet Muhammed, which led to protests in the Middle East.

events.name: Middle East protests
events.wd_description: Prominent Gulf countries described the comments as insulting and summoned the respective Indian ambassadors, raising concerns about Islamophobic discourse and actions against Indian Muslims.
events.description: Prominent Gulf countries described the comments as insulting and summoned the respective Indian ambassadors, raising concerns about Islamophobic discourse and actions against Indian Muslims.

events.name: BJP's initial reaction
events.wd_description: There was no initial reaction from the ruling Party, but as boycotts and sanctions grew, the government dismissed the comments as fringe elements within the Party.
events.description: There was no initial reaction from the ruling Party, but as boycotts and sanctions grew, the government dismissed the comments as fringe elements within the Party.

events.name: BJP's action
events.wd_description: Both spokespeople were fired by the BJP, which stated that strong action will be taken against individuals who make insulting statements.
events.description: Both spokespeople were fired by the BJP, which stated that strong action will be taken against individuals who make insulting statements.

events.name: Supporters' reaction
events.wd_description: Ardent supporters of the ruling Party spoke out against the decision to expel the spokespeople, calling it a cowardly act by the BJP.
events.description: Ardent supporters of the ruling Party spoke out against the decision to expel the spokespeople, calling it a cowardly act by the BJP.

events.name: Critical stage of US-China ties
events.wd_description: Chinese Defense Minister Wei Fenghe stated that US-China ties were at a critical stage and called on the US to improve the bilateral relationship while rejecting US accusations and threats.
events.description: Chinese Defense Minister Wei Fenghe stated that US-China ties were at a critical stage and called on the US to improve the bilateral relationship while rejecting US accusations and threats.

events.name: Wei Fenghe's statement
events.wd_description: Wei Fenghe said it was up to the US to improve the bilateral relationship and firmly rejected US smearing, accusations, and threats.
events.description: Wei Fenghe said it was up to the US to improve the bilateral relationship and firmly rejected US smearing, accusations, and threats.

events.name: Lloyd Austin's response
events.wd_description: Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin noted the increasing number of unsafe encounters between Chinese and other countries' planes and vessels, reaffirming US support for its allies, including Taiwan.
events.description: Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin noted the increasing number of unsafe encounters between Chinese and other countries' planes and vessels, reaffirming US support for its allies, including Taiwan.

events.name: Russia-Ukraine discussion
events.wd_description: At the meeting, Wei stated that China supported peace talks in Ukraine and opposed maximum pressure tactics, clarifying that China had not provided material support to Russia.
events.description: At the meeting, Wei stated that China supported peace talks in Ukraine and opposed maximum pressure tactics, clarifying that China had not provided material support to Russia.

events.name: Expert analysis
events.wd_description: Meia Nouwens, a senior fellow at the International Institute for Strategic Studies, noted that Wei's speech was consistent with Beijing's stance on the Russia-Ukraine issue.
events.description: Meia Nouwens, a senior fellow at the International Institute for Strategic Studies, noted that Wei's speech was consistent with Beijing's stance on the Russia-Ukraine issue.

events.name: Global EV Battery Supply Chain Crisis
events.wd_label: Global EV Battery Supply Chain Crisis
events.wd_description: The Russian invasion of Ukraine has exacerbated the global supply chain crisis of the automotive industry, particularly in e-mobility.
events.description: The Russian invasion of Ukraine has exacerbated the global supply chain crisis of the automotive industry, particularly in e-mobility.

events.name: EV Supply Chain Impact
events.wd_description: The invasion has worsened the already fragile supply chains of EV and battery metals, which were previously affected by the Covid-19 pandemic.
events.description: The invasion has worsened the already fragile supply chains of EV and battery metals, which were previously affected by the Covid-19 pandemic.

events.name: t: Automotive Supply Chain Disruption
events.wd_description: Many automakers and suppliers have stopped operations in Russia due to economic sanctions and import-export bans.
events.description: Many automakers and suppliers have stopped operations in Russia due to economic sanctions and import-export bans.

events.name: t: Semiconductor Unavailability
events.wd_description: The unavailability of semiconductors has slowed down the recovery of the automotive industry.
events.description: The unavailability of semiconductors has slowed down the recovery of the automotive industry.

events.name: Nickel Pricing Fiasco
events.wd_description: The war has caused a significant increase in nickel prices, impacting the EV supply chains, especially in European and North American markets.
events.description: The war has caused a significant increase in nickel prices, impacting the EV supply chains, especially in European and North American markets.

events.name: t: Nickel Price Surge
events.wd_description: Nickel prices hit $100,000 per ton, stalling the London Metal Exchange (LME).
events.description: Nickel prices hit $100,000 per ton, stalling the London Metal Exchange (LME).

events.name: t: Impact on Other Metals
events.wd_description: Prices of other materials like aluminum, steel, palladium, and neon gas have also increased substantially.
events.description: Prices of other materials like aluminum, steel, palladium, and neon gas have also increased substantially.

events.name: Reducing Russian Dependence
events.wd_description: Efforts are being made to find alternative sources for nickel and reduce dependence on Russian supplies.
events.description: Efforts are being made to find alternative sources for nickel and reduce dependence on Russian supplies.

events.name: t: Indonesian Nickel Projects
events.wd_description: Indonesia is working on projects to convert its limonite reserves into mixed hydroxide precipitate (MHP) for Class 1 nickel production.
events.description: Indonesia is working on projects to convert its limonite reserves into mixed hydroxide precipitate (MHP) for Class 1 nickel production.

events.name: t: Alternative Battery Chemistries
events.wd_description: Automakers are considering battery chemistries that require less nickel, such as LFP batteries used by Tesla.
events.description: Automakers are considering battery chemistries that require less nickel, such as LFP batteries used by Tesla.

events.name: t: Government Initiatives
events.wd_description: Governments are actively securing reliable sources for critical minerals needed for EV production.
events.description: Governments are actively securing reliable sources for critical minerals needed for EV production.
